1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A young man accidently runs over a girl on the street. His parents' find out, thus his mother goes back to the scene of the crime and turns herself in. (Russian with English subtitles)

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Trial continues for Tatiana, but the detective catches the family lying. While they're battling with legal issues, Arina is critically injured in the hospital. Financial obstacles show up for both parties.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Denis and Nadya had their wedding party while Tatiana is experiencing her new life in prison. Arina's mother struggles to find money for the operation when she calls Denis and he accepts to help. How will they find the money? (Russian with English subtitles)

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Arina needs money for the operation but her mother cannot provide this amount. Denis takes out a loan to pay for it. Arkady saves Tatiana when Ivan harasses her. However, Ivan's power in the colony seriously conflicts with Tatiana's and Arkady's destinies.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Tatiana and the women try to team up against Ivan. Ivan gets caught harassing Tatiana. Arina goes through the operation, which resulted in much pain, although Denis interests Arina, he is forbidden to see her again.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The questioning begins. All the inmates are question regarding Ivan Gavrilov while Gavrilov and the principle team up against Tatiana. Denis and Nadya are on the verge of divorce as she is about to give birth to their son. (Russian with English subtitles)

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Another encounter happens because of Tatiana. Ivan and Arkady end it tragically. The waren tries to put Tatiana and Arkady under trial and guilty. Does Tatiana finally receive justice?

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: The tug-and-pull between love and cruel jealousy takes everyone to extreme behaviors. How do they finally resolve this intermingled love hexagon?

imdb.plot outline: An intense drama of life behind bars - where a mother takes the fault of manslaughter for her son. Lies, deceit and greed drive her family into a world of corrupt cops, power-hungry men and vicious women. Can she get her life back on track?
imdb.title: Uravnenie lyubvi
plot: An intense drama of life behind bars - where a mother takes the fault of manslaughter for her son. Lies, deceit and greed drive her family into a world of corrupt cops, power-hungry men and vicious women. Can she get her life back on track?
